TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MapAreaShape extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the shape of a map area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape> enumeration represents the shape of a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapArea> object. This enumeration is usually used to set the shape of a custom map area. A custom map area has user-defined coordinates and shape, as opposed to a map area that represents a chart element, which has a shape that is determined by the element it represents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape Circle = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The shape of the map area is circular.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape Polygon = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The shape of the map area is polygonal.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape Rectangle = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The shape of the map area is rectangular.
